articles.title: Game-based test that detects hearing loss in children wins European innovation medal - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A game-based test that detects hearing loss in children has recently been awarded a European innovation medal. Both the test and the technology behind it have been developed by Norwegian researchers.
articles.content: A game-based test that detects hearing loss in children has recently been awarded a European innovation medal. Both the test and the technology behind it have been developed by Norwegian researchers.… [+1440 chars]

articles.author: Sue Lannin
articles.title: Meta shares plunge as profit halves, Amazon sees slower growth, ASX opens lower after mixed night on Wall Street - ABC News
articles.description: Shares in Facebook owner Meta Platforms plunge after weak quarterly earnings; Amazon sees slower growth, ASX opens in the red, and the European Central Bank raises interest rates again.
articles.content:
Shares of Facebook owner Meta Platforms have plunged by nearly one-quarter, and the Australian share market has opened in the red. 
Key points:
